name: Auth Email
description: [INTERNAL-ONLY: use auth_email_password/auth_email_passwordless/auth_email_link.] Authenticating users with email only or an email/password combination.

send_verification.name: Send Email Verification (No Password)
send_verification.description: Send a one-time verification code to an email address to verify ownership. Does not require a password.

verify_add_no_pass.name: Verify and Add Email to Existing User (No Password)
verify_add_no_pass.description: Verify a user's email address and register it with an existing account. Does not require a password.

verify_login_or_create_no_pass.name: Verify and Login as (or Create) User (No Password)
verify_login_or_create_no_pass.description: Verify the email address code and return a userToken to AN account (creates a new account if one doesn't exist). Does not require a password.

verify_link_email.name: Verify and Link Email Address to User
verify_link_email.description: Verify a user's email address and link it to an existing account without allowing login passwordless.

verify_sign_up_email_pass.name: Verify and Sign Up with Email and Password
verify_sign_up_email_pass.description: Sign up a new user with an email and password.

sign_in_email_pass.name: Sign In with Email and Password
sign_in_email_pass.description: Sign in a user with an email and password.

verify_add_email_pass.name: Verify and Add Email and Password to existing user
verify_add_email_pass.description: Verify a user's email address and register it with an existing account. Requires a password.
